name: DIY Monsters
description:
These little monsters are alone. Let's help them to find a new friend applying the "Do It Yourself" philosophy!

In DIY Monsters you will have to build monsters assembling the correct parts with the correct colors. Paint the bodies and the eyes! Bake the bodies in the furnace! Assemble everything and drag the new friend to his little friend!

Credits:

Programming: Alejandro Pinel Martínez

Art: Ana Zamudio Gutiérrez
